name: contribution-updater
description: Updates public contribution of user on github to s3 bucket or cloudflare r2
author: Tarun Singh

scripts.deploy: cross-env NODE_ENV=production gcloud functions deploy contrib-updater --region=northamerica-northeast2 --runtime nodejs16 --entry-point=index --gen2 --source ./build --trigger-http
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run compile -- --watch" "nodemon --watch ./build/ --exec npm run debug"
